description: Detects execution of "reg.exe" to disable security services such as Windows Defender.
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
John Lambert (idea)
elhoim
name: Security Service Disabled Via Reg.EXE
query: (process.command_line.text:"*reg*" AND process.command_line.text:"*add*" AND process.command_line.text:"*d\ 4*" AND process.command_line.text:"*v\ Start*" AND process.command_line.text:("*\\AppIDSvc*" OR "*\\MsMpSvc*" OR "*\\NisSrv*" OR "*\\SecurityHealthService*" OR "*\\Sense*" OR "*\\UsoSvc*" OR "*\\WdBoot*" OR "*\\WdFilter*" OR "*\\WdNisDrv*" OR "*\\WdNisSvc*" OR "*\\WinDefend*" OR "*\\wscsvc*" OR "*\\wuauserv*"))
